name: The Last Guardian (itch)
description:
The Last Guardian

Game created for Ludum Dare 46.

Trees of Life are the source of life everywhere. There used to be many of them. But then the droughts came and with them the monsters. An unstoppable army of the Lich King.

And now there is only one Tree left in the world. You have sworn to keep the last Tree alive. You have sworn to repel the ravenous hordes. And you must gather the sacred Acorns, so the groves might be remade.

Save the Tree to save us all.

______________________________________________________

In “The Last Guardian”, you will be doing your best to keep the last Tree of Life, well, alive.

  • Your only tree is brown and sad? Sing a song to the clouds!
  • Overrun by monsters? Smash them with your staff!
  • Somewhat overwhelmed or lonely? Why not grow some friends!
  • Hungry and hurt? Just remember what does not fall far from the tree!
_____________________________________________________ Controls
  • WSAD or ↑↓← → to move
  • SPACE to attack
  • Q (hold) to summon nearby clouds to your position.
  • E to plant a Cactus, pick up an Acorn, pick up an Apple.
Gamepad Controls
  • Left Thumbstick to move
  • X to attack
  • Y (hold) to summon nearby clouds to your position.
  • A or B to plant a Cactus, pick up an Acorn, pick up an Apple.

GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED! It's just... more comfortable.

Tools

Made with Godot 3.2 engine.
